analysis.key_quote: This rule change will allow this (or future) administrations to purge federal employees who the administration dislikes even if they are performing their jobs above expectations, as defined by the workers’ job descriptions and performance plans.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about its potential to undermine merit-based hiring and firing processes, violate due process rights, and enable political interference in civil service employment, which aligns with the themes of politicization and institutional knowledge loss.
